00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PostStream
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]

00033 
00034  SUBROUTINE PostStream
00035 
00036 ! Common Variables
00037  USE Domain
00038  USE FluidParams, ONLY : phi
00039  USE LBMParams
00040  USE MPIParams
00041  USE MPI
00042  IMPLICIT NONE
00043 
00044 ! Local Variables
00045  INTEGER :: count, i, j
00046  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ
00047  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00048 
00049 !-------- Exchange inward pointing values of f ---------------------------------
00050 ! X DIRECTION
00051  count = 1
00052  DO j = yl, yu
00053    f_west_snd(count) = f(xlg,j,3,nxt)
00054    f_east_snd(count) = f(xug,j,1,nxt)
00055    count = count + 1
00056  END DO
00057 
00058  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_east_rcv, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00059  CALL MPI_SEND( f_west_snd, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00060  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00061 
00062  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_west_rcv, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00063  CALL MPI_SEND( f_east_snd, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00064  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00065 
00066 ! Y DIRECTION
00067  count = 1
00068  DO i = xl, xu
00069    f_south_snd(count) = f(i,ylg,4,nxt)
00070    f_north_snd(count) = f(i,yug,2,nxt)
00071    count = count + 1
00072  END DO
00073  
00074  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_north_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00075  CALL MPI_SEND( f_south_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00076  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00077 
00078  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_south_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00079  CALL MPI_SEND( f_north_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00080  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00081 
00082 
00083 !-------- Update inward components of f and g in the real nodes ----------------
00084 ! X DIRECTION
00085  count = 1
00086  DO j = yl, yu
00087    f(xu,j,3,nxt) = f_east_rcv(count)
00088    g(xu,j,3,nxt) = g_east_rcv(count)
00089    g(xu,j,6,nxt) = g_east_rcv(count + xsize)
00090    g(xu,j,7,nxt) = g_east_rcv(count + xsize2)
00091 
00092    f(xl,j,1,nxt) = f_west_rcv(count)
00093    g(xl,j,1,nxt) = g_west_rcv(count)
00094    g(xl,j,5,nxt) = g_west_rcv(count + xsize)
00095    g(xl,j,8,nxt) = g_west_rcv(count + xsize2)
00096    count = count + 1
00097  END DO
00098 
00099 ! Y DIRECTION
00100  count = 1
00101  DO i = xl, xu
00102    f(i,yu,4,nxt) = f_north_rcv(count)
00103    g(i,yu,4,nxt) = g_north_rcv(count)
00104    g(i,yu,7,nxt) = g_north_rcv(count + ysize)
00105    g(i,yu,8,nxt) = g_north_rcv(count + ysize2)
00106 
00107    f(i,yl,2,nxt) = f_south_rcv(count)
00108    g(i,yl,2,nxt) = g_south_rcv(count)
00109    g(i,yl,5,nxt) = g_south_rcv(count + ysize)
00110    g(i,yl,6,nxt) = g_south_rcv(count + ysize2)
00111    count = count + 1
00112  END DO
00113 
00114 ! DIAGONALS
00115  g(xu,yu,7,nxt) = g_ne_rcv
00116  g(xl,yu,8,nxt) = g_nw_rcv
00117  g(xl,yl,5,nxt) = g_sw_rcv
00118  g(xu,yl,6,nxt) = g_se_rcv
00119 
00120 !-------- Calculate order parameter using updated values of f ------------------
00121  DO j = yl, yu
00122    DO i = xl, xu
00123      phi(i,j) = f(i,j,0,nxt) + f(i,j,1,nxt) + f(i,j,2,nxt) + f(i,j,3,nxt) &
00124               + f(i,j,4,nxt)
00125    END DO
00126  END DO
00127 
00128 !-------- Exchange and update phi for all ghost nodes --------------------------
00129 ! X DIRECTION
00130  count = 1
00131  DO j = yl, yu
00132    phi_west_snd(count) = phi(xl,j)
00133    phi_east_snd(count) = phi(xu,j)
00134    count = count + 1
00135  END DO
00136 
00137  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_east_rcv, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00138  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_west_snd, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00139  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00140 
00141  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_west_rcv, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00142  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_east_snd, xsize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00143  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00144 
00145 ! Y DIRECTION
00146  count = 1
00147  DO i = xl, xu
00148    phi_south_snd(count) = phi(i,yl)
00149    phi_north_snd(count) = phi(i,yu)
00150    count = count + 1
00151  END DO
00152 
00153  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_north_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00154  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_south_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00155  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00156 
00157  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_south_rcv, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00158  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_north_snd, ysize, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00159  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00160 
00161 ! DIAGONALS
00162  phi_ne_snd = phi(xu,yu)
00163  phi_nw_snd = phi(xl,yu)
00164  phi_sw_snd = phi(xl,yl)
00165  phi_se_snd = phi(xu,yl)
00166 
00167  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_ne_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00168  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_sw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00169  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00170 
00171  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_sw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00172  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_ne_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00173  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00174 
00175  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_se_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00176  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_nw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00177  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00178 
00179  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_nw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00180  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_se_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00181  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00182 
00183 !---------Update all phi values in the ghost nodes---------------------------------------------------------------------
00184 ! X DIRECTION
00185  count = 1
00186  DO j = yl, yu
00187    phi(xug,j) = phi_east_rcv(count)
00188    phi(xlg,j) = phi_west_rcv(count)
00189    count = count + 1
00190  END DO
00191 
00192 ! Y DIRECTION
00193  count = 1
00194  DO i = xl, xu
00195    phi(i,yug) = phi_north_rcv(count)
00196    phi(i,ylg) = phi_south_rcv(count)
00197    count = count + 1
00198  END DO
00199 
00200 ! DIAGONALS
00201  phi(xug,yug) = phi_ne_rcv
00202  phi(xlg,yug) = phi_nw_rcv
00203  phi(xlg,ylg) = phi_sw_rcv
00204  phi(xug,ylg) = phi_se_rcv
00205 
00206  RETURN
00207  END SUBROUTINE PostStream
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:52 2008 for ZSC-2D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
